title: Jade Buddha Vegetarian
description: 玉佛寺素斋馆, at 江宁路999号(安远路口), is located in an old traditional-style Buddhist temple - enter at #1017. The menu is also in English and has photos. Restaurant entrance is not clearly marked but you can see it from Jiangning road. Nearby MRT station is Changshou Rd, line 7, 13 - take exit 4 walk east (turn right) on Changhshou, then go south (turn right) on Jiangning.
